title: "AI ‘Mischief Models’ Have the Potential To Make a Fresh Internet Hell"
excerpt: "A YouTuber in the AI community trained an AI language model called “GPT-4chan” to give misogynistic responses to questions. This suggests that many people will be able to use and expand on this AI that espouses hate speech – and that got the attention of the AI ethics community."
